body.p: I enclose a letter from an old friend of mine in Boston. If it is "compatible with the public interest" to make, in Boston, such an appointment as he desires I am satisfied that it could not be more worthily bestowed
I would like to hear if you can comply with his wishes

Very truly yr friend
H. C. Pindell

Massachusetts
Comr of Deeds
Jos H. Lord
Boston
Com. Issd Mar 13. 1863
